name: 鄭怡雯
objective: This course is designed for international students who have been asked to take Introduction of Sociology as a requirement. It will introduce some ideas of sociology and pay attention to the development of Taiwan’s society through watching films and field trips. In addition, students’ everyday life will become the topics of sociological dialogue and imagination in class, which may further promote multicultural understanding on campus. At the end of this course, everyone has to complete a photography project of “My Sociological Eye.”
